name: Trombone Charlotte Quartet does Christmas
description:
Trombone Charlotte is flying back from New Orleans just for this show, because Christmas with us is magical. It's our chosen family, it's our living room and it's a great excuse not to cook Christmas dinner. Bring your friends, bring your family, bring yourself and be part of ours.  

Trombone Charlotte will give you the old classics with all of her heart and fun songs with the best vibes. Don't miss it.
